title: Visiting Two Eras
content:
Greater Albion's next two releases are imminent-Granville inspired by Victorian era shop signage, and Federal Streamliner, based on lettering seen shooting past on the side of an old railway carriage!

These should appear in the next day or so on Myfonts. In the meantime there are previews [on our blog.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017163334/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/)
author: Rasendyll
